label: Sinai Greek NF MG 14, Undertext (Christian Palestinian Aramaic)

note: Early large CPA | Short letters 'lamed' and 'tet'

note.value: Each of the three CPA UTOs in this manuscript is written by a different hand
Description of undertext by Christa Müller-Kessler

Bibliography: P. Nicolopoulos, The New Finds: Holy Monastery and Archdiocese of Sinai (Athens, 1999), p. 144 ; C. Müller-Kessler, "1.4.9 Christian Palestinian Aramaic Translation," in A. Lange and E. Tov (eds.), Textual History of the Hebrew Bible, Leiden: Brill, 2016, pp. 447-456 ; C. Müller-Kessler “Proverbs 11:1b–15 as Transmitted in an Unpublished Christian Palestinian Aramaic Palimpsest from St Catherine’s Monastery (Sinai, Greek NF MG 14),” Journal of Septuagint and Cognate Studies 52 (2019), pp. 157-165 [DOI: 10.2143/JSCS.52.0.3287099]
